1422250.name: Threeson Anniversary Pack!
1422250.description:
September is both Tris Barona's birthday month and the anniversary of his adventure, so to commemorate that the city council of Threeson has put this lovely package together for its first time visitors!

What you'll get:

Visitor's Guide to Threeson - Did you want to learn more about some of the characters and lore of Threeson? Easter eggs, behind the scenes facts about the game? Well look no further! The Visitor's Guide to Threeson comes in PDF format and provides all the must have information for a true fan of DON'T GIVE UP!

2 Watercolor Wallpapers - You know those sweet ultra move portraits in game of Subris and Tris? You'll get the full res version of these to use on your desktop or print up!

1 sheet of pixel portraits for 9 core characters to use as avatars / icons!
1422250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
